sub_title: Global Engagement Explorer *****, Happiness Makes Money, Profijtabiliteit
summary:
Since November 1995 (start of my company, called ANDARE, now Ter Wal Beheer BV), I love to support organizations with increasing the employability and especially the engagement of their employees: because HAPPINESS MAKES MONEY. 
As a consultant, speaker, lecturer and author, I've changed the focus of my business over the last couple of years. My focus was for a long time on preventing and reducing sick leave and presenteeism. Now, I focus more on company culture, amplition and employee engagement. 

My program is called: Value-to-Profit: how aligning of the core values of a company with the non-negotiables of the employee will increase profitability in the broad sense. My model gives steps to support company culture, increase engagement and profitability, on a proven scientific basis. 

I support profit and not-for-profit organizations to develop and implement new engagement, vitality and sick leave concepts, life and online. With the 7 keys of Talent Management Engagement as ROI. My services are connected to a) what I do best and b) get my clients real results. 

My services are:

 👉B2B company: Getting to know the core values/non-negotiables of your organisation; supporting to create a better company culture and higher engagement.

 👉B2B company: Reducing sick leave and presenteeism by creating more engagement and a better approach of sick employees

 👉B2B company: improving employability with social aspects; strong company, group and project identification and aimed at achieving tangible results

 👉B2B individual: training and coaching of leadership and HR-advisors on these items

My slogan is: Make Your Choice. 

If you’re interested in learning more about how I can help you and your organisation with increasing your profitability by improving culture, engagement and employability, please email me on 
paul@andare.nl 
or call me at +31651663087 

www.paulterwal.com
www.team-andare.com

treasury_media.description: Happiness makes Money: how working from core-values will increase engagement and profitability of companies. Team ANDARE will support you and your team to create alignment on your non-negotiables. Happy employees will improve your business on the 7 keys of Human capital engagement.

treasury_media.title: Team ANDARE Verzuimaanpak 3.0
treasury_media.description: Vanuit een mensgerichte aanpak werken als medewerker met steun van de organisatie aan een verantwoorde terugkeer naar werk kan veel effectiever. Het gaat niet om de Wet Verbetering Poortwachter, maar om de mens als belangrijkste inzet.

awards.title: Ridder Orde Oranje Nassau / Knight Order Oranje-Nassau
Beverly Babb-Award for Extraordinary Service 2016
awards.description: In 2012, the Beverly Babb Award for Extraordinary Service was created and awarded to Beverly Babb, CAE for her commitment to the advancement of the Global Speakers Federation.  The award was created to recognize the service of individuals who have contributed strongly to the foundational growth of the GSF and/or one of our member associations. This award recognizes individuals who typically serve “behind the scenes” without expectation of recognition or reward. They may not be well known across borders but have contributed extraordinarily to the growth, strength and substance of the Global Speakers Federation. In 2013 this award was given to Claudia Haider for all her work for GSF and GSA.

awards.title: Long Life member
awards.description: Long Life member of the PSA Holland in honor of being the co-founder of the PSA Holland, long time boardmember and President

awards.title: Certified Speaking Professional
awards.description:
The Certified Speaking Professional designation,established in 1980, is the speaking industry’s
international measure of speaking experience and skill. CSP is conferred by the National
Speakers Association of Australia (NSAA) and the Global Speakers Federation (GSF) only on those
accomplished speakers who have earned it by meeting strict criteria. The letters CSP
following a speaker’s name indicate a speaking professional with proven experience who
understands what is required and knows how to deliver client satisfaction.

awards.title: Fellow of the Professional Speakers Association UK & Ireland
awards.description:
The Fellow of the PSA designation is the speaking industry’s international measure of speaking experience and skill. FPSA is conferred by the Professional Speakers Association of the UK & Ireland  (PSA UKI) and the Global Speakers Federation (GSF) only on those
accomplished speakers who have earned it by meeting strict criteria. The letters FPSA 
following a speaker’s name indicate a speaking professional with proven experience who
understands what is required and knows how to deliver client satisfaction.

projects.title: HR2020 denktank
projects.description:
HR2020 Beweging is een stroming van verbonden en bewogen talentondernemers. het maakt van lijnmanagement, zorgwerkers en HR-staf zelfstandige HR Professionals. Ze streven er naar om andere (zorg)professionals het allerbeste uit zichzelf én uit teams te laten halen.

HR is de brandstof voor professioneel leiderschap in actie. HR2020 wil in de Zorgsector het ‘Witte Vuur’ in ons aller handelen aanwakkeren en blijvend laten branden. Met een betere professionelere zorg voor de patiënten én een betere toekomst voor zorgwerkers. Want dát zijn tenslotte de gouden handen aan het bed.

Samen op reis in een HR-landschap. In co-creatie naar de toekomst. Met HR2020 bouwen we een HR-functie van én voor lijnmanagement en medewerkers. Samen maken zij, met ondersteuning van de HR-staf echt verschil.

profile_positions.title: President

volunteer_experiences.description: In 2019 - 2020 I will be the President of the global Speakers Federation. Since 2007, I am a member of the Board of the GSF; have been Secretary and Treasurer. Current Vice President. It's a four year commitment in the Presidential Leadership Team.
